targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 48 - CHAR_LENGTH(CONCAT("$Kunden",' | Web Videos'))), CONCAT("$Kunden",' | Web Videos'))
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Kunden",' | Web Videos') as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

libraryPanel.name: MDR TV Web Video Heute KPI

targets.rawSql:
IF ${Zeitraum:doublequote} = "date = CURRENT_DATE()"
THEN
SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av_joined_today
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND 
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags) AND
("$Sendung" = sendungs_id OR "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags))
AND date = ${bq_today:doublequote}
AND (av_content_type = "video" OR av_content_type = "Video")
; 
ELSE
SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av_joined_daily
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags) AND
("$Sendung" = sendungs_id OR "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags))
AND date = ${bq_yesterday:doublequote}
AND (av_content_type = "video" OR av_content_type = "Video")
;
END IF
;

libraryPanel.name: MDR TV Web Video Gestern KPI (Vergleichzeitraum)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
FROM 
  ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av_joined_daily

site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND

AND ("$Sendung" = sendungs_id OR "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags))
AND date = ${bq_yesterday:doublequote}
AND (av_content_type = "video" OR av_content_type = "Video")

libraryPanel.name: NDR/MDR TV Web Video Heute/Gestern KPI Difference

targets.rawSql:
IF ${Zeitraum:doublequote} = "date = CURRENT_DATE()"
THEN
 WITH current_value AS (
  SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as current_sum
FROM 
  ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av_joined_today
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND ("$Sendung" = sendungs_id OR "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags))
AND date = ${bq_today:doublequote}
AND (av_content_type = "video" OR av_content_type = "Video")
), past_value AS (
  SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as past_sum
FROM 
  ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av_joined_daily
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND ("$Sendung" = sendungs_id OR "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags))
AND date = ${bq_yesterday:doublequote}
AND (av_content_type = "video" OR av_content_type = "Video")
)
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference
; 
ELSE
 WITH current_value AS (
  SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as current_sum
FROM 
  ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av_joined_daily
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND ("$Sendung" = sendungs_id OR "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags))
AND date = ${bq_today:doublequote}
AND (av_content_type = "video" OR av_content_type = "Video")
), past_value AS (
  SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as past_sum
FROM 
  ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av_joined_daily
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND ("$Sendung" = sendungs_id OR "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags))
AND date = ${bq_yesterday:doublequote}
AND (av_content_type = "video" OR av_content_type = "Video")
)
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference
;
END IF
;

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 30 - CHAR_LENGTH("${Zeitraum:text}")), "${Zeitraum:text}")
FROM(
SELECT "${Zeitraum:text}" as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 24 - CHAR_LENGTH("${Vergleichszeitraumlabels}")), "${Vergleichszeitraumlabels}")
FROM(
SELECT "${Vergleichszeitraumlabels}" as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

libraryPanel.name: NDR TV Top Web Video Heute

targets.rawSql:
IF ${Zeitraum:doublequote} = "date = CURRENT_DATE()"
THEN
SELECT 
bi_av_content_id,
  CASE
    WHEN length(bi_av_content) > 45 THEN SUBSTR(bi_av_content, 0 , 40) || '...'
    ELSE bi_av_content
  END AS bi_av_content,
sum(m_av_playbacks) as wiedergabe,
FROM
(
SELECT
bi_av_content_id,
m_av_playbacks,
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_content) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_content, 
FROM 
Piano.av_joined_today
WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags) AND 
("$Sendung" = sendungs_id OR "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)) 
AND (av_content_type = "video" OR av_content_type = "Video")
AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND date = ${bq_today:doublequote}) GROUP BY bi_av_content,bi_av_content_id
--,device_type 
ORDER BY 3 DESC
Limit 10
; 
ELSE
SELECT 
bi_av_content_id,
  CASE
    WHEN length(bi_av_content) > 45 THEN SUBSTR(bi_av_content, 0 , 40) || '...'
    ELSE bi_av_content
  END AS bi_av_content,
sum(m_av_playbacks) as wiedergabe,
FROM
(
SELECT
bi_av_content_id,
m_av_playbacks,
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_content) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_content, 
FROM 
Piano.av_joined_daily
WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags) AND 
("$Sendung" = sendungs_id OR "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags))
AND (av_content_type = "video" OR av_content_type = "Video")
AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND date = ${bq_today:doublequote}) GROUP BY bi_av_content,bi_av_content_id
--,device_type 
ORDER BY 3 DESC
Limit 10
;
END IF
;

libraryPanel.name: NDR TV Top Web Video Gestern (Vergleichzeitraum)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
bi_av_content_id,
  CASE
    WHEN length(bi_av_content) > 45 THEN SUBSTR(bi_av_content, 0 , 40) || '...'
    ELSE bi_av_content
  END AS bi_av_content,
sum(m_av_playbacks) as wiedergabe,
FROM
(
SELECT
bi_av_content_id,
m_av_playbacks,
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_content) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_content, 
FROM 
ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av_joined_daily
WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags) AND
("$Sendung" = sendungs_id OR "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)) AND (av_content_type = "video" OR av_content_type = "Video")
AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND date = ${bq_yesterday:doublequote}) GROUP BY bi_av_content,bi_av_content_id
ORDER BY 3 DESC
Limit 10

list.name: Kunden
list.query: MDR SPIO, NDR Info, NDR, NDR HH, NDR NDS, NDR SH, NDR MV, NDR SportZone, NDR Kultur, NDR Bewegungs-Docs, NDR Ernährungs-Docs, NDR Expeditionen ins Tierreich, NDR Länder Menschen Abenteuer, NDR Mare TV, NDR Markt, NDR Visite, NDR Zapp

list.name: Zeitraum

options.value: date >= (SELECT saturday FROM(SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) as saturday)) AND date <= (SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) as sunday)
date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()

list.query: Heute : date = CURRENT_DATE(), Gestern : date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  1 DAY), Letztes Wochenende :  date >= (SELECT saturday FROM(SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\,WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) as saturday)) AND date <= (SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\,WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) as sunday), Letzte 7 Tage : date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE "$Kunden"
WHEN "MDR SPIO" THEN "mdr.de"
ELSE "ndr.de" END

SELECT CASE "$Kunden"
WHEN "MDR SPIO" THEN "sport"
WHEN "NDR Info" THEN "nachrichten"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "Alle Kapitel 1"
WHEN "NDR HH" THEN "nachrichten"
WHEN "NDR NDS" THEN "nachrichten"
WHEN "NDR SH" THEN "nachrichten"
WHEN "NDR MV" THEN "nachrichten"
WHEN "NDR SportZone" THEN "sport"
WHEN "NDR Kultur" THEN "kultur"
WHEN "NDR Bewegungs-Docs" THEN "Alle Kapitel 1"
WHEN "NDR Ernährungs-Docs" THEN "Alle Kapitel 1"
WHEN "NDR Expeditionen ins Tierreich" THEN "Alle Kapitel 1"
WHEN "NDR Mare TV" THEN "Alle Kapitel 1"
WHEN "NDR Markt" THEN "Alle Kapitel 1"
WHEN "NDR Visite" THEN "Alle Kapitel 1"
WHEN "NDR Zapp" THEN "Alle Kapitel 1" END

SELECT CASE "$Kunden"
WHEN "MDR SPIO" THEN "Alle Kapitel 2"
WHEN "NDR Info" THEN "info"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "Alle Kapitel 2"
WHEN "NDR HH" THEN "hamburg"
WHEN "NDR NDS" THEN "niedersachsen"
WHEN "NDR SH" THEN "schleswig-holstein"
WHEN "NDR MV" THEN "mecklenburg-vorpommern"
WHEN "NDR SportZone" THEN "Alle Kapitel 2"
WHEN "NDR Kultur" THEN "Alle Kapitel 2"
WHEN "NDR Bewegungs-Docs" THEN "Alle Kapitel 2"
WHEN "NDR Ernährungs-Docs" THEN "Alle Kapitel 2"
WHEN "NDR Expeditionen ins Tierreich" THEN "Alle Kapitel 2"
WHEN "NDR Mare TV" THEN "Alle Kapitel 2"
WHEN "NDR Markt" THEN "Alle Kapitel 2"
WHEN "NDR Visite" THEN "Alle Kapitel 2"
WHEN "NDR Zapp" THEN "Alle Kapitel 2" END

SELECT CASE "$Kunden"
WHEN "MDR SPIO" THEN "Alle Sendungs-ID"
WHEN "NDR Info" THEN "Alle Sendungs-ID"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "Alle Sendungs-ID"
WHEN "NDR HH" THEN "Alle Sendungs-ID"
WHEN "NDR NDS" THEN "Alle Sendungs-ID"
WHEN "NDR SH" THEN "Alle Sendungs-ID"
WHEN "NDR MV" THEN "Alle Sendungs-ID"
WHEN "NDR SportZone" THEN "Alle Sendungs-ID"
WHEN "NDR Kultur" THEN "Alle Sendungs-ID"
WHEN "NDR Bewegungs-Docs" THEN "Die Bewegungs-Docs"
WHEN "NDR Ernährungs-Docs" THEN "Die Ernährungs-Docs"
WHEN "NDR Expeditionen ins Tierreich" THEN "Expeditionen ins Tierreich"
WHEN "NDR Mare TV" THEN "mareTV"
WHEN "NDR Markt" THEN "Markt"
WHEN "NDR Visite" THEN "Visite"
WHEN "NDR Zapp" THEN "ZAPP" END

SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 8 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "date >= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY),INTERVAL 7 DAY) as saturday) AND date <= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL 7 DAY) as sunday)"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  60 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY)"
  END

SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "Gestern"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "Gestern vor 7 Tagen"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "Vorletztes Wochenende"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "Letzte 8-14 Tage"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "Letzte 31-60 Tage"
  END

SELECT CASE "$Kunden"
WHEN "MDR Aktuell" THEN "$Image2"
WHEN "MDR ST" THEN "$Image2"
ELSE "$Image1" END

SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "Heute"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "Gestern"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "letztes Wochenende"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "letzte 7 Tage"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "letzte 30 Tage"
  END

SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "Gestern"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "Gestern vor 7 Tagen"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "vorletztes Wochenende"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "letzte 8-14 Tage"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "letzte 31-60 Tage"
  END

SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "_last_hour"
  END

dashboard.title: NDR NDS | TV Web | Video | Heute | Gestern
